sentences.english: I wish you all, wherever you may be, a very happy Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 不論你們現時身在何處，我都祝願你們聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: It just doesn\t say Christmas to me somehow.
sentences.chinese: 由於某種原因，它不會對我說聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: I wish you a gay and merry Christmas. All emotion and finest wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我所有的愛心與竭誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: We wish you a merry Christmas. All affection and best wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我們所有的愛心與真誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: Wishing you a Merry Christmas and allgood things for the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 祝你聖誕快樂，新年萬事如意。

sentences.english: I wish you a merry Christmas. Affection and best wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我一切的愛心與真誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: One of the pastors saw our creation and congratulated us.
sentences.chinese: 一位牧師看了我們的傑作，祝我們聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: I wish you a gay and merry Christmas. All affection and best  wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我所有的愛心與真誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: I wish you a happy New Year. All affection and best wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我一齊的愛心與真誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: Merry Christmas from all of your students.
sentences.chinese: 祝您聖誕快樂，您的全體學生敬上。

sentences.english: A merry Christmas from your student.
sentences.chinese: 祝您聖誕快樂，您的學生敬上。

sentences.english: We wish you a merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 願你聖誕快樂齊來互祝愉快。

sentences.english: Moblog Forum hope everyone had a nice christmas, if you celebrated.
sentences.chinese: 博客論壇祝大家聖誕快樂，如果你過這個節日的話。

sentences.english: A merry Chistmas from yours friend.
sentences.chinese: 祝您聖誕快樂，您的朋友敬上。

sentences.english: A merry Chistmas from every of your students.
sentences.chinese: 祝您聖誕快樂，您的團體學生敬上。

sentences.english: I wish you a merry Christmas. All affection and best wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我一切的愛心與真誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

definition: give birth to a son soon (propitiatory compliment to the newly-weds)
May you have a prosperous New Year! (New Year's greeting)
see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
thriving and prosperous business or trade
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
(literary) I trust you have been well since we last met
